group.name: build-resources
group.purpose: Scripts used to build temporary tables used when executing assertions that must be executed prior to the execution of assertion scripts

group.name: rf2-assertions
group.purpose: Scripts that contain assertions regarding the validity of rf2 files

group.name: rf1-assertions
group.purpose: Scripts that contain assertions regarding the validity of rf1 files

group.name: clean-up
group.purpose: Scripts that remove the temporary tables used for executing assertions
